solution_line_template: There were {total_drops_used} / {drops_per_beaker} = <<{total_drops_used}/{drops_per_beaker}={beakers_tested}>>{beakers_tested} beakers tested to find all the beakers with copper ions.
Thus, {beakers_tested} - {beakers_with_copper} = <<{beakers_tested}-{beakers_with_copper}={beakers_without_copper_tested}>>{beakers_without_copper_tested} beakers without copper ions were tested.
